content:
https://simplifier.net/ui/ig/MedMij -- note that we currently have a problem in offering this page publicly for some reason. We have a workaround for that. Please let us know your simplifier account name if you are interested in the contents. We hope to eliminate the need for this workaround soon

Update 15:15: page is now presumably completely public as planned. Should you still have issues: let us know
Hi Alex, I am trying to start the Connectathon today, but do not see a lot of data yet. Will there be more data tomorrow?

First of all I applaud your enthusiasm :-) But seriously: you are a day early. We are beefing up our example stack as we speak. I've only just got Ewouts validator to work so I can get a feel for validaty of what we produce. We'll have more tomorrow for sure, but don't expect hundreds. If you have useful material feel free to share too. We'll definitely need some crowdsourcing as well
Thanks Alexander, you are right, no problem! I was just curious, and it is great to know more stuff is coming!
